---
title: butterscotch sauce
ingredients: |-
  * 1﻿ 1/4 C brown sugar
  * 1﻿/2 C cream
  * 2﻿ T light corn syrup
  * 4﻿ T butter
  * 1﻿ t vanilla
directions: |-
  1. C﻿ombine first 4 ingredients in a saucepan.
  2. B﻿oil 1 minute.
  3. R﻿emove from heat, stir in vanilla
category: condiment
rating: 4
ease: easy
needsMarinade: false
thumbnail: data:image/jpeg;base64,
---
